infotexts.entitydescription.pucsplus:
Enhanced version of PUCS, which greatly improves combat effectiveness, reduces oxygen consumption, and can resist ‖color:190,170,100,255‖radiation‖color:end‖ and ‖color:190,170,100,255‖fire‖color:end‖ hazards, and has built-in ‖color:190,170,100,255‖advanced drug injection, noise reduction, thrusters and sonar systems‖color:end‖, which can Give users stronger combat maneuverability.
Drugs can be placed: (upper left grid) Saline, Blood Pack, Alien Blood, (upper right grid) Morphine, Fentanyl, Deusizine; ‖color:238,99,99,255‖Combat Stimulant can also be placed here, but it can only be placed automatically when the blood volume is low injection.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.PCPS_InterfaceControll: It is used to control the display of various functional interfaces of ‖color:190,170,100,255‖PUCS PLUS‖color:end‖. You can hold the controller, check "Disable interface" and put it back into ‖color:190,170,100,255‖PUCS PLUS‖color:end‖ to turn off the display of the functional interface.
